mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, from posts where pid=#{pid}
select count(*) from posts where title like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
select count(*) from pcomments where pcid=#{pcid}
mapper.insert: insert into posts(uid, writer, title, contents, regdate) values(#{uid}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{regdate})
insert into pcomments(pid, writer, body) values(#{pid}, #{writer}, #{body})
mapper.update: update posts set writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, regdate=#{regdate} where pid=#{pid}
update pcomments set body=#{body}, regdate=now() where pcid=#{pcid}
update posts set vcnt=vcnt+1 where pid=#{pid}
update posts set rcnt=rcnt+#{amount} where pid=#{pid}
